jml.object.sources
Class ObjectSource

java.lang.Object
  jml.object.sources.ObjectSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryShellObjectSource, BufferSource, FileSource, MultiSource, SamplingSource, TransformedSource
public abstract class ObjectSource
extends java.lang.Object

Title: ObjectSource

Description: An abstract class that represents an indexed source of labeled data record.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: Universidad Nacional de Colombia

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jonatan Gomez

Method Detail

get

public ObjectSource get(int[] index)
Get a new data source with the selected data records

Parameters:
index - Data records that will define the new data source. I suggest to sort the vector before calling this method in order to speed up the algorithm
Returns:
A new data source with the selected objects

public abstract java.lang.Object get(int index)
Gets the data record at the specific position given

Parameters:
index - The index of the data object to be returned
Returns:
The data object at the given position, null if there is not object at that position
